entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Periods of rain beginning late this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early this morning except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this evening and after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023
